name: onprem-chat-panel
description: Opens Continue chat in the right sidebar on startup for offline/on-prem environments (avoids Copilot Chat UI).

cursorOnprem.rightPanel.launcher.description: If enabled, show the On-Prem Agents launcher UI (webview) on startup.

cursorOnprem.rightPanel.agent.description: Which agent to prefer at startup. 'continue' opens Continue on the right panel. 'opencode' opens OpenCode terminal. 'off' does nothing automatically.

cursorOnprem.gateway.apiBase.description: On-prem Gateway base URL ending with /v1 (e.g. http://cursor-poc-gateway:8081/v1). If empty, uses $VLLM_API_ENDPOINT or Continue config.

cursorOnprem.gateway.tokenSource.description: Where to load the workspace-scoped gateway token from. tabby=tabby.api.authToken, continue=~/.continue/config.json models[0].apiKey, env=GATEWAY_TOKEN, none=manual.

cursorOnprem.chat.model.description: Chat model name for /v1/chat/completions. If empty, uses Continue config models[0].model.

commands.title: On-Prem: Open Continue Chat on Right Sidebar
